sub_contents.text:
當對坐的人拿出手機開始沈默地、在另一個世界滑動，我總想也拿出我的。
我也沈默地點點滑滑，替自己在現實世界裡，製造一點抗議的聲音。
When people sitting in front of me take out their smart phone, quietly sliding their fingers in the other world, I always think of taking out mine. I also quietly slide my fingers, making some noises, protesting in the real world.

Android app. 使用Facebook api讀取動態消息，用Puredata轉為聲音輸出，同時也將資料流視覺化輸出。使用者可利用手勢和聲音及影像互動。
The mobile application grabs feeds from Facebook account then turn them into sound and visual data streams. Through swipe gesture, users can interact with the sound and visual.
